怭字的基本解释

怭
bì
〔怭怭〕轻薄，不庄重，如“曰既醉止，威仪怭怭。”

怭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》毗必切，入質，並。］
见“怭怭”。

怭字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　怭； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页382第16
【廣韻】毘必切【集韻】【韻會】薄必切【正韻】薄密切，?音佖。【玉篇】慢也。【詩·小雅】曰旣醉止，威儀怭怭。【朱傳】言凡飮酒者，常始乎治，終乎亂也。　又【韻會】房密切。義同。　與佖通。

怭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
怭字的起名意思

暂无。

frivolous
Basic explanation of words
frivolous
bì
〔怭怭] Flimsy, not solemn, such as "saying to stop drunk, prestige and shameless."
frivolous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" must cut, enter the quality, and merge. ]
See "Yang Xiao".
frivolous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怭; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 382 16
[Guang Yun] Bibiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Thin Biqie [Zhengyun] Thin and close,? Sound. [Jade articles] Slow. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Said to stop drunk, majestic and dazed. [Zhu Chuan] It is said that those who drink alcohol often begin to cure and end in chaos.　[Yunhui] The room is close. The same meaning.　 communicates with the collaterals.
